    • Method Detail

      • associatedDictionary

        public boolean associatedDictionary()
        visit all words in a dictionary. Create a thread for each word. Then, add the thread into threadsList.
      • if there are slots in threadsList, add the thread.
      • if there is no slot in threadsList,find threads are no long alive and kill them. If found a non associated word, call all alive threads in threadsList and stop them.
        The program stops when the size of threadsList = 0.
Overrides:
associatedDictionary in class Sequential
Returns:
true if all words in the dictionary were found on a cube.
false if found 1 word doesn't exist on a cube.
